alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

"... No less well-demonstrated is that this can be done without compromising any known experimental fact or practical formula. But although these alternative explanations have now been around for nigh on half a century, they receive scarcely a mention in those halls of academic science where the stench of the sacred bull continues to be savoured as though it were a divine incense, and where no suggestion of opening a logical window or using an analytic deodorant is allowed."

- UMBALA - A Polemic Against Jargon-Addiction in Modern Physics, Viv Pope, Proceedings of the 22nd Annual International Meeting of the Alternative Natural Philosophy Association (ANPA, Cambridge UK).
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Speed of Light in a Vacuum - Part 2
